original_text: And when you sacrifice a sacrifice of thanksgiving to the Lord, you shall sacrifice it so that you may be accepted.
korean_text: 너희가 여호와께 감사제물을 드리려거든 너희가 기쁘게 받으심이 되도록 드릴지며

sentences.original_text: And when you sacrifice a sacrifice of thanksgiving to the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 주께 감사의 제사를 드릴 때에,

sentences.original_text: so that you may be accepted.
